question: # Q1. When developing a backlink strategy, what approach would be most beneficial?
options: Guest post the article to as many sites as possible
Create an infographics and share it with relevant bloggers
Distribute links in comment sections of websites
answerText: Guest post the article to as many sites as possible

question: # Q2. What is a key reason the URL `domain.com/apparel/jackets` is preferable to the URL `domain.com/p=141`?
options: It is readable to a human
answerText: It is readable to a human

question: # Q3. Which HTTP response status code would indicate a page has been moved permanently?
# Q4. You notice a website is serving HTML to a Search Engine than to a human user. What is this an example of?
answerText: Cloaking

question: # Q5. What would significantly improve Google's ability to a non-YouTube video in its Search Results?
options: Provide a 150 x 80 pixel thumbnail image
Embed video objects with JavaScript conditionals
answerText: Add Schema.org VideoObject

question: # Q6. Google primarily determines indexing and ranking by crawling which version of a page?
answerText: Responsive version

question: # Q7. You want to identify which US state has the most search interest for a particular keyword. What tool would help you determine this?
answerText: Google Trends

question:
# Q8. You want to block crawlers from accessing your entire website. What robots.txt entry would you use?
- [ ]
```markdown
User-agent: Allbots
Disallow: \*

```
# Q9. Which results is most likely if you use an interstitial pop-up that requires a user to take action before you load the content of the page?
options: Both the pop-up and the content of the page will be indexed
The pop-up will be indexed instead of the desired body content
An interstitial pop-up is treated the same as a soft 404
The pop-up will be ignored, and the content of the page will be indexed correctly
answerText: The pop-up will be indexed instead of the desired body content

question: # Q10. You notice a particular product in an e-commerce storefront is no longer indexed despite no technical issues. What is a likely reason for this?
options: No title or meta description tags were provided
Robots.txt is configured to allow access
The product is out of stock
answerText: No title or meta description tags were provided

question: # Q11. All bylone dates for articles are suddenly no longer visible on a `website's` listing within Google Search. Assuming no changes have been made to the site programming or content, what is the most likely cause?
options: The site has been delisted from Google Search
A Google News sitemap was not provided within 30 days of setting up a publisher center account
The site kept updating the dates to make the content appear fres, without changing
The articles have aged more than 365 days without any significant updates to the content or the site
answerText: The articles have aged more than 365 days without any significant updates to the content or the site

question: # Q12. Which approach is not advisable to Geo-targeting your website?
options: Using a gTLD with a subdirectory
answerText: using URL parameters

question: # Q13. You have been asked to help a big e-commerce brand optimize their website for search engines. They currently have thousands of products listed on their website. What is your most appropriate first step?
options: Recommend that they add more products
302 redirect all product pages to URL that contains target keywords
302 redirect all product ages to a URL that contains target keywords
Register the business with a Google My Business account.
answerText: WOrd on compressing image files

question: # Q14. What Does The Term "Sandbox" Mean In SEO?
options: The Box With Paid Ads That Appear When You Perform A Search.
This Is Where Sites Are Kept Till They Get Mature Enough To Be Included In The Top Rankings For A Particular Keyword
A Special Category Of Sites That Are Listed In Kid-safe Searches
The First 10 Search Results For A Particular Keyword.
answerText: This Is Where Sites Are Kept Till They Get Mature Enough To Be Included In The Top Rankings For A Particular Keyword

question: # Q15. What Is Anchor Text?
options: It Is The Main Body Of Text On A Particular Web Page
It Is The Text Within The Left Or Top Panel Of A Web Page
It Is The Visible Text That Is Hyper Linked To Another Page
It Is The Most Prominent Text On The Page That The Search Engines Use To Assign A Title To The Page
answerText: It Is The Visible Text That Is Hyper Linked To Another Page

question: # Q16. Which Google search query should be used to return only PDF documents that reference Microsoft?
answerText: Microsoft filetype:pdf

question: # Q17. Which link is not crawlable?
answerText: <a onclick="newwin('domain.com')">

question:
# Q18. Which choice represents the best header structure?
- [ ]
```markdown
H1: How to Bak Bagels
H2: Ingredients
H3: Dry Ingredients
H4: Wet Ingredients
H2: Instructions
H6: Reviews

```

# Q19. All byline dates articles are suddenly no longer visible on a website's listing within Google Search. Assuming no changes have been made to the site programming or content, what is the most likely cause?
options: The site has been delisted from Google Search
The site kept updating the date to make the content appear fresh, without changing the content.
The articles have aged more than 365 days without any significant updates to the content or the site.
A Google New sitemap was not provided within 30 days of setting up a Publisher Center account

question: # Q20. What is an example of a Google search result that can be found in position zero?
answerText: featured snippet

question: # Q21. When creating accessible video content, what should you consider including?
answerText: transcript

question: # Q22. You are optimizing a website that sells supplies for banking donuts. Which approach is most appropriate to drive more organic traffic?
options: Buy donutbakingsupplies.com and 301 redirect to your website
Add the keyword "donut supplies" to every page.
Create a new blog with high-quality donut recipes
Join a link farm to rapidly build inbounnd links.
answerText: Create a new blog with high-quality donut recipes

question: # Q23. Why is it important to be mindful of outbound follow links?
options: There is a limit to how many links you can create.
Any follow links reduce your PageRank by 1.
Your site's reputation is tied to the sites you link to.
answerText: Your site's reputation is tied to the sites you link to.

question: # Q24. Which statement is true about JSON-LD?
options: It has no relation to JSON.
It is the only structured data format available.
It is considered the most complicated approach to adding structured data.
It is Google's preferred structured data format.
answerText: It is Google's preferred structured data format.

question: # Q25. What is a key reason why duplicate content might cause an issue with ranking?
options: It creates an inability to use canonical URLs, which dramatically reduces crawl effectiveness,
It requires using a 302 redirect, which dilutes PageRank.
It triggers an immediate manual action penalty, which delists an entire domain until the duplicate content is removed.
It makes it difficult for a search engine to determine the original and authoritative content source.
answerText: It makes it difficult for a search engine to determine the original and authoritative content source.

question: # Q26. What attribute would you use to describe the content of an image?
answerText: alt

question: # Q27. You are researching keywords for a client and creating list for an optimization plan. Which is not a recommended method of creating keyword lists?
options: focusing on only high-volume, high-popularity words
answerText: focusing on only high-volume, high-popularity words

question: # Q28. You want to get a rough idea of how many searches per month a particular search term gets. Which tool do you use?
answerText: Google Keyword Planner

question: # Q29. Changing the title tag and/or meta description will have a measurable impact on your \_\_\_\_.
